text: Yamini Singh (born 17 May, 1996) is an Indian actress and model, who appears mainly in Bhojpuri films. She made her Bhojpuri debut with 2019 film Patthar Ke Sanam with Arvind Akela Kallu and Awdhesh Mishra. ==Early life and education== Yamini Singh was born 17 May 1996 in Lucknow of Uttar Pradesh to mother Sunita Singh. She received primary education from Rani Laxmi Bai Memorial Senior Secondary School. She attend Dr. D.Y. Patil College of Engineering, Pune and attained Engineering degree. She is also a fashion designer. ==Career== Singh made her Bhojpuri debut with 2019 film Patthar Ke Sanam opposite Arvind Akela Kallu. She is also appear in Lallu Ki Laila with Dinesh Lal Yadav and Chhaliya with Arvind Akela Kallu. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" |+Key | style="background:#ffc;"| | Denotes films that have not yet been released |} {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
